name: QuerySmtpTokens
description:
Retrieve SMTP API tokens by campaign name or emailCampaignId.

Use this tool to query multiple SMTP API tokens associated with a campaign by its name, or to retrieve a single token using an emailCampaignId. This is useful for managing email campaigns and accessing specific token information.

parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: Name of the campaign tied to the SMTP API token to query tokens.

value_schema.description: A name for the campaign tied to the SMTP API token.

parameters.name: email_campaign_id
parameters.description: Identifier assigned to the campaign provided during the token creation. Used to retrieve a specific SMTP API token.

value_schema.description: Identifier assigned to the campaign provided during the token creation.

parameters.name: result_pagination_start
parameters.description: Specify a starting point for retrieving the next set of results. Use this for paginating through results.

value_schema.description: Starting point to get the next set of results.

parameters.name: maximum_tokens_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of SMTP API tokens to return in the response.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of tokens to return.
